Package com.deco2800.game.components

Class InformPlayerComponent

java.lang.Object
com.deco2800.game.components.Component
com.deco2800.game.components.InformPlayerComponent
public class InformPlayerComponent
extends Component
Component used to store information related to the player's information sending.

  • Method Details

    • create

      public void create()
      Description copied from class: Component
      Called when the entity is created and registered. Initial logic such as calls to GetComponent should be made here, not in the constructor which is called before an entity is finished.
      Overrides:
      create in class Component

    • setPosition

      public void setPosition​(float position)
      Set's position
      Parameters:
      position - position to set; if the position is greater than 0 or the current position, it will be updated, otherwise it will be reset to 0 if the position is 0. Will not change otherwise

    • setTriggers

      public void setTriggers​(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.String> triggers)
      Set's triggers
      Parameters:
      triggers - position to set; if the position is greater than 0 or the current position, it will be updated, otherwise it will be reset to 0 if the position is 0. Will not change otherwise

    • setInformation

      public void setInformation​(java.lang.String information)
      Set's the new text on the UI once the updateInformation event has been triggered. This occurs only if the entity has been created (i.e. it is not null)
